DOC.brief_summary: The object study compare internet-delivered treatment insomnia face-to-face treatment waiting-list . In study participant randomize : 1 ) online cognitive-behavioral intervention ; 2 ) face-to-face cognitive behavioral intervention ; 3 ) waiting-list . Both online face-to-face intervention consist : diary ; psycho-education ; relaxation exercise ; stimulus control/sleep hygiene ; sleep restriction ; challenge misconception sleep ; paradoxical exercise . Adult person insomnia invite via popular scientific website fill online questionnaire . Participants fill questionnaire dairy baseline post-test , 3-month follow-up , 6-month follow-up . Participants waiting-list receive online treatment first post-test . The investigator expect online-delivered treatment face-to-face treatment equally effective .
DOC.criteria: Insomnia disorder accord DSM5 Sleep onset latency/wake sleep onset > 30 minute , three time week Insomnia three month long Access internet Possibility travel one treatment sit Earlier cognitive behavioral treatment insomnia Start psychological treatment last 6 month Doing shift work Major depression disorder Pregnancy breast feed Schizophrenia psychosis Suicidal plan Sleep apnea drug alcohol abuse
